title: (x) Help with a font from image / oblique comic/signpainter caps - Komika-Title {Seb}
content:
Hey guys,

Can't seem to figure out what font that is, but I'm working on a project and I'd love some help.

- J

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ffta.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100406153059/http:/typophile.com/files/ffta_0.jpg) | 21.43 KB |
author: tennessee83

comments.content:
I think this is similar to Freehand 575 from Bitstream. It's not identical (see the U), but it's from the same genre of brush poster lettering. House signpainter set also has some similar styles.

- Mike Yanega
